name: Apollo
short-description: Self-hosted desktop stream host for Artemis with built-in virtual display and HDR support
long-description: Apollo is a self-hosted desktop stream host for Artemis (Moonlight Noir) offering low latency, native client resolution streaming, and cloud gaming server capabilities. Features built-in virtual display with HDR support, permission management, clipboard sync, and hardware encoding support for AMD, Intel, and Nvidia GPUs.
description: Self-hosted desktop stream host for Artemis with built-in virtual display and HDR support
author: ClassicOldSong
